body.name: Clek Olli Backless Booster Car Seat with Rigid Latch, Mammoth
features: Rigid LATCH connectors attach securely to your vehicle's lower anchors in seconds, providing additional booster seat stability in a collision.
Built like the seat in your car. Our Comfort-cube construction includes an additional layer of padding that protects against numb-bum.
Quick release system makes uninstalling the seat just as quick as installing.
body.description: As a parent, you’ll appreciate that the Olli belt-positioning backless booster has earned industry awards. With its integrated rigid-LATCH system, the Clek Olli securely fastens to your vehicle’s lower anchors providing additional stability in a collision and a consistent belt fit every time. But, we have an even tougher audience to please: 6 to 12-year-olds who won’t settle for ugly or uncool. With a carrying strap and a quick-release system, Olli gives kids the freedom to carry their own ride wherever they go – from your car to a taxi or even a plane.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome booster seat
reviews.reviewText: This booster is great. Easy to install and very safe!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars safe and comfortable for 6 year old
reviews.reviewText: Loved the Clek Fllo that we had our granddaughter using in our Camry. She outgrew that car seat after using it most of her life. Still looked brand new since we don't allow food in our car. This was a good choice for her now that she is six. I still trust the Clek brand and like the fact that it is made in North America. What I was disappointed in was that it was called 'Mammoth' the same as the Fllo but this one has no wool in the fabric. I might have bought another color if I'd realized that. We have an Olli now in two other family cars. They are easy to carry in the airport and put in the overhead compartment on a plane. We just clipped it into the rental car and were all set without having to use a seat provided by the rental company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love this guy!
reviews.reviewText: Very stable and safe. This Mamooth Wool color doesn’t have any flame retardants either.
